attributes.action: We welcome President Trump to the UK
attributes.additional_details: We have seen the results of unchecked immigration in Europe. We in Britain do not want to go the same way. We don't need any more wars but we do need to protect ourselves
attributes.background: President Trump is doing his best to defend the USA from terrorists masquerading as visitors. He is rebuilding the structure and the productivity of his country and will create jobs and success for many who are now unemployed and without a home. It is in Britains interest to welcome President Trump.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want President Trump to make a state visit to the UK, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844
